Package gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.candidate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CandidateFilter
    An interface to extend when defining candidate referent filtering methods to eliminate candidate referents incompatible with the coreferential mention on some specific constraint.
    PostScoringCandidateFilter
    An interface to extend to define methods to identify the best referent among a set of scored candidate referents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CandidateSalience
    This class defines methods to break ties between a number of candidate referents that are equally likely to corefer with the coreferential mention.
    DefaultCandidateFilter
    The default candidate filtering method.
    ExemplificationFilter
    This filter eliminates potential referents that are exemplifications of other textual units.
    HasSemanticsFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that do not have non-coreferential semantics.
    NounPhraseFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that do not constitute noun phrases.
    PostScoringCandidateFilterImpl
    Implementations of various post-scoring candidate filtering methods.
    PriorDiscourseFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that appear subsequent to the coreferential mention in the document.
    SameSentenceFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that do not appear in the same sentence as the coreferential mention.
    SemanticClassFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that are not associated with one of the pre-defined semantic classes, such as Entity.
    SemanticTypeFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that are not associated with one of the pre-defined semantic types, such as Disorder, Drug, etc.
    SingletonMentionFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that are singleton coreferential mentions (i.e., not part of a coreference chain).
    SubsequentDiscourseFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that appear prior to the coreferential mention in the document.
    SyntaxBasedCandidateFilter
    This filter eliminates candidates syntactically linked to the coreferential mention, except when they are expected to be linked syntactically, such as when the coreference involves CoreferenceType.Appositive, CoreferenceType.PredicateNominative types or mentions are relative pronouns or reflexive pronouns.
    VerbPhraseFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that do not constitute verbal phrases OR that are associated with entity objects.
    WindowSizeFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that do not appear within a pre-defined number of sentences from the coreferential mention.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CandidateSalience.Type
